byline.original: By NIKITA STEWART and ARIELLE DOLLINGER

abstract: Cesar Gonzales-Mugaburu, who has plead not guilty on charges of sexually abusing five of his adopted sons, is charged with abusing another boy in his home on Long Island; Gonzales-Mugaburu's lawyer says children who are accusing him of these crimes, some of whom are now adults, are lying.
lead_paragraph: Cesar Gonzales-Mugaburu, who is charged with sexually abusing five of his adopted sons, pleaded not guilty in Suffolk County court after being accused of abusing another young boy.
snippet: Cesar Gonzales-Mugaburu, who is charged with sexually abusing five of his adopted sons, pleaded not guilty in Suffolk County court after being accused of abusing another young boy....

headline.main: New Charges for Long Island Foster Father Accused of Abusing Boys
headline.print_headline: New Charges  Are Added  to Abuse Case of L.I. Man
